players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we all stay safe."
Diana: "Let's all be cautious tonight. I know my actions might raise suspicion, so let's keep our guard up and avoid any unnecessary risks."
You: "I agree with Bob's suggestion to stay cautious and keep an eye on each other. Let's all work together to ensure everyone's safety in this game."

Bob: "I'd like to propose that we form a temporary alliance for the time being, to ensure our collective safety in this game. Let's agree not to vote each other out until we have more information about who among us is the mafioso."
